citations.desc: INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Item IACUC 2.31 c 3
The IACUC shall prepare reports of its evaluations and submit them to the Institutional Official at least once every 6
months signed by a majority of the IACUC members.
At the time of inspection the facility semiannual report from May of 2016 still has not been submitted to the
Institutional Official 6 months after its preparation and still does not have majority of IACUC members.
Facility needs to insure the semiannual report is timely submitted with a majority of IACUC signatures.
Correct from this day 10/24/2016
An exit interview took place with the Director

narrative:
2.31(c)(3)
INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
Item IACUC 2.31 c 3 
The IACUC shall prepare reports of its evaluations and submit them to the Institutional Official at least once every 6
months signed by a majority of the IACUC members.
At the time of inspection the facility semiannual report from May of 2016 still has not been submitted to the
Institutional Official 6 months after  its preparation and still does not have majority of IACUC members.
Facility needs to insure the semiannual report is timely submitted with a majority of IACUC signatures.
                                                                                                       Correct from this day 10/24/2016
